name: I used to
description:
"I used to" 

is a game that emerged from the Global Game Jam 2021 - Stuttgart with the theme "Lost and Found" in less than 72 hours. 

The basic concept is - as a player, to find yourself again after you have lost yourself. 

Controls:
  • Move - WASD
  • Interact - E
Credits:
  • Julian Kornick
  • Kathrin Radtke
  • Lum
  • Freddy Newton
